Question
========

A person achieves a score of 9.5 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 9.4 with a standard deviation 1.8. The z-score of the person with 9.5 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06
* 0.35
* 0.88

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Correct
* 0.35: Incorrect
* 0.88: Incorrect
